title: President Donald J. Trump Signs S. 490, S. 931 and S. 2734 into Law â€“ The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			
Issued on:
July 27, 2018
On Friday, July 27, 2018, the President signed into law:S. 490, which allows for the extension of the construction license for the Gibson Dam Hydroelectric Project in Montana;S. 931, which designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 4910 Brighton Boulevard in Denver, Colorado, as the George Sakato Post Office; andS. 2734, which designates the Federal building and United States courthouse located at 1300 Victoria Street in Laredo, Texas, as the George P. Kazen Federal Building and United States Courthouse.
